description:
雅思口语中有很多很多的话题，总有一些特别的话题，本文给大家带来的是雅思口语part 2典型话题，供11条，希望能够帮助烤鸭们锻炼出流利的口语，烤鸭们，快来围观吧。

1.Now I’m going to give you a topic and I’d like you to talk about it for one or two minutes. Before you talk, you will have one minute to think about what you will say. You can make some notes.

2.Here is a paper and pencil for you to make some notes if you wish, and here is your topic.

3.Describe a teacher who has influenced you. Say where you met them, what subjects they taught, why they were special and how they influenced you.

4.Describe a family member who has influenced you. Say how long you have known them them, why they were special, how they differ from the other family members, and how they influenced you.

5.Describe a story, book, or movie that had a big impact on you. Describe what it was about, what effect it had and why it was so powerful.

6.Describe a place you visited that had a big impact on you. Say when you went and how long you stayed. Describe the impact the place had on you and why.

7.Describe an event in your life that had a big impact on you. Say when it happened and what the circumstances were. Describe how it affected you and why.

8.Describe a friend in your life that had a big impact on you. Say how long you have known him or her and how he or she affected you.

9.Describe a person you would most like to meet. Describe this person and state why you would most like to meet him or her. What effect would the meeting have on you? What would you say.

10.Describe a time in your life that was difficult. What was the problem? What were some of the things that helped you to overcome this problem? What did you learn from this experience, and what advice would you give others.

11.Describe a time in your life when you helped someone else with a problem. What was the problem? How did you help the other person? What did you learn from this experience, and what advice would you give others? Would you help in the same way?

以上就是11条part2典型话题啦，希望对你有所帮助！

title: 11条雅思口语典型话题分享
